attributes.action: 2% or more pay rise for nurses, doctors, teachers and police this year.
attributes.additional_details: To recognise the risk to themselves and families from having to work through the pandemic on the front lines, and to reward their devotion and efforts.
attributes.background: The Government must pay public sector key workers a pay rise in real terms this year to reflect their efforts during the pandemic.  This must be at least a 2% increase.
